attributes.action: Make learning about the LGBTQ+ community a part of the school curriculum.
attributes.additional_details: The younger children learn about how it is perfectly normal to love who you want, the less chance they will become homophobic and disrespectful.
attributes.background: I had never even heard of LGBTQ until I went on social media and learnt about it. I also had to explain to my friends what it was - they had no idea! I think that this is a problem that needs to be solved.

rejection.details:
Since 2020 there has been a legal requirement for schools to teach PHSE, including LGBT content.

You can read more here

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/relationships-education-relationships-and-sex-education-rse-and-health-education/introduction-to-requirements
